  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBooksActivity
    This activity is used to add a book.
    Book
    The book class.
    BookDescription
    This class details the description of a book.
    BookDescriptionReceiver
    This class is used to get the books description, it works with the BookWebAPIHelper
    BookDescriptionTest  
    BookImageViewHolder
    The view holder for the arraylist of book images
    BookRecyclerAdapter
    The recycler adapter for books.
    BookRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder
    Inner Class ViewHolder defines all of the elements in the corresponding xml file.
    BookTest  
    BookValidator
    Determines if a newly added book is valid
    BookWebAPIHelper
    This class is used to get the book's description from google's book api
    BorrowersBooksActivity
    This activity is where borrowers can see and filter all of the books they are interested in.
    ContactInfo
    This class outlines a user's contact info
    ContactInfoTest  
    CurrentUser
    This class is a singleton and contains the current user
    DatabaseHelper
    The database helper.
    DatabaseHelperTest  
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    HorizontalAdapter
    The Horizontal RecyclerView Adapter used to display images for books
    Location
    This class describes a location
    LocationTest  
    LoginActivity
    Allows user's to log in both automatically and manually, also allows users to create a new account
    MyBooksActivity
    Display all of the books a user has and allow the user to filter them by book status
    NavigationHandler
    Handles the navigation between screens with a navigation bar
    Notification
    This class describes a notification
    NotificationActivity
    The notification activity.
    NotificationTest  
    ProfileActivity
    Displays a user's profile, can display either the current user's profile or the profile of another user
    Rating
    This class describes the concept of a rating
    RatingTest  
    RequestHandler
    This class handles all requests for a book
    RequestHandlerTest
    Created by Luke Slevinsky on 2019-02-15.
    ScannerActivity
    The scanner activity launches the scanner and returns the ISBN of the scanned barcode
    SearchActivity
    This activity is where borrowers can filterSearchedBooks for all available books they can request.
    SignInValidator
    Determines if a user's login details are of proper format
    SignInValidatorTest  
    SignUpActivity
    This activity allows user's to register for a new account
    SignUpValidator  
    SignUpValidatorTest
    Created by Luke Slevinsky on 2019-02-23.
    State
    Created by Luke Slevinsky on 2019-02-15.
    StateTest
    Created by Luke Slevinsky on 2019-02-18.
    SwipeToDeleteCallback
    Created by Luke Slevinsky on 2019-03-03.
    TextValidator
    A simple wrapper class to simplify the TextWatcher interface The abstract class was taken from this forum post: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2763022/android-how-can-i-validate-edittext-input#answer-11838715
    User  
    UserTest  
    ViewableImage  
    ViewableImageTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BookStatus
    Contains the 4 statuses a book may have
    HandoffState
    Contains the 5 different handoff states possible
    NotificationType
    Contains the 3 notification types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RatingOutOfBoundsException
    This exception indicates that a rating was set that was either larger than the maximum permitted rating ot lesser than the minimum permitted rating
    RequestorsUnavailableException
    Raised by the request handler accepting or denying a request from a user who is not a requestor
